attributes.action: Ban the involvement of charities at Primary, Secondary, and college level.
attributes.additional_details: The third sector- Charities and other non-governmental organisations are increasingly getting involved in education by supplying materials and even funding buildings. This is a conflict of interest. If a business was bribing some one for access to individuals. It would be questionable yet charities are doing it to councils for access to children. I would call it brain washing your children.
